p: To a suspension of compound 2e (0.200 g, 7.19 × 10 −4 mol) in 1,4-dioxane (3.0 mL), 1 M aqueous sodium hydroxide (2.16 mL, 2.16× 10 −3 mol) was added, and compound 2f was obtained as a white solid (0.158 g, 88 % yield). R f = 0.78 (ethyl acetate/light petroleum 1:10). 1H NMR (CDCl 3, 400 MHz): δ H = 2.15 (2H, quint, J = 7.2 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2H), 2.62 (2H, t, J = 6.8 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2H), 3.34 (2H, d, J = 6.4 Hz, CH 2Ph), 3.85 (3H, s, OCH 3), 4.06 (2H, t, J = 6.0 Hz, OCH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2H), 5.05 – 5.12 (2H, m, CH=CH 2), 5.92–6.02 (1H, m, CH=CH 2), 6.70–6.83 (2H, m, H-3 and H-5), 6.83 (1H, d, J = 8.4 Hz, H-6) ppm. 13C NMR (CDCl 3, 100.6 MHz): δ C = 24.31 (OCH 2 CH 2CH 2CO 2H), 30.55 (OCH 2CH 2 CH 2CO 2H), 39.77 ( CH 2Ph), 55.85 (O CH 3), 67.99 (O CH 2CH 2CH 2CO 2H), 112.45 (C-3), 113.73 (C-6), 115.60 (CH=CH 2), 120.48 (C-5), 133.26 (C-4), 137.60 ( CH=CH 2), 146.49 (C-1), 149.50 (C-2), 179.15 ( CO 2H) ppm. HRMS: m/z (ESI) calculated for C 14H 19O 4 [M+1] + = 251.1278; found = 251.1274.
